control.name: Implement policies and procedures to grant access to EPHI
control.desc:
Implement policies and procedures for granting access to electronic protected health information (EPHI).

Once the covered entity has determined that the person or system is authorized, there are numerous ways to grant access to EPHI. In general, a covered entity's policies and procedures must identify who has authority to grant access privileges. It must also state the process for granting access.
